text: Welcome to Drinks Tube, I'm Beccy a Youtuber with
a massive love of tea. Today I'm going to show you how to prepare Loose leaf tea.
I'm Mike, the lover of all things creamy and the lover of all things chocolatey
I'm 'ear' today, to bring you a new hot chocolate recipe
This one... is my white hot chocolate.
Ah, that makes me very happy!
I'm Sam Carter and I'm a gym professor. I'm going to show you how to make a sublime moment.
It uses gin, pink grapefruit and vanilla and when you shake all of these ingredients together
It produces a flavour transmodification, which means you should taste chocolate... it's amazing.
